name: 01 Test workflow config
description: Test workflow configuration for assets deployment

steps.name: Test first step
steps.instructions: In the {file_location} directory reate a .md file to store decommission process log. Use the following details to fill the file: ticket number: 'Test-ticket_01'; client name: VisaBank; decommission object: SDK; decommissionned channels: iOS, Android; decommission date: today
steps.completion: User has to confirm that they copied the assets to the git repo folder.

steps.name: workflow-creation
steps.instructions: Create a workflow configuration file in the {configurations_location} directory with the following requirements: 1.  the same structure as '01 Test workflow config' workflow config; 2. the following steps should be described: define the task in github issue, implement the task, test the task, push changes to the repo, create pull request; 3. the context should contain the following properties: ticket_number, repo_credentials.
steps.completion: User confirms successful merge of the pull request and that the workflow configuration file is created in the {configurations_location} directory.

steps.name: Summary of the workflow
steps.instructions: Create a summary of the workflow in {file_location} containing all information from the pipeline including start and completion dates, context parameters values and steps executed.
steps.completion: User has to confirm summary file existing.
